name: tram-logo
description: This logo was created for the Tram-One Project, it was designed by Daniel Jurman

scripts.build:black:32: svgexport tram.svg black_32x32.png pad 32:32 "svg{-webkit-filter: grayscale(100%) brightness(69%) contrast(200%);}"
scripts.build:black:64: svgexport tram.svg black_64x64.png pad 64:64 "svg{-webkit-filter: grayscale(100%) brightness(69%) contrast(200%);}"
scripts.build:black:128: svgexport tram.svg black_128x128.png pad 128:128 "svg{-webkit-filter: grayscale(100%) brightness(69%) contrast(200%);}"
scripts.build:black:256: svgexport tram.svg black_256x256.png pad 256:256 "svg{-webkit-filter: grayscale(100%) brightness(69%) contrast(200%);}"
scripts.build:black:512: svgexport tram.svg black_512x512.png pad 512:512 "svg{-webkit-filter: grayscale(100%) brightness(69%) contrast(200%);}"
scripts.build:black:1024: svgexport tram.svg black_1024x1024.png pad 1024:1024 "svg{-webkit-filter: grayscale(100%) brightness(69%) contrast(200%);}"
scripts.build: npm run build:color:32 && npm run build:color:64 && npm run build:color:128 && npm run build:color:256 && npm run build:color:512 && npm run build:color:1024 && npm run build:black:32 && npm run build:black:64 && npm run build:black:128 && npm run build:black:256 && npm run build:black:512 && npm run build:black:1024
